pages.title: The Great Work
pages.text: The pinnacle of Architect technology. The Echoway is not a portal in the magical sense; it is a machine that generates a stable wormhole through spacetime, connecting to another Echoway with a matching resonant frequency, or 'Address'.
$(o)Architect Stone$() seems to be a hyper-dense composite material, infused with a sort of memory storage that comes from the infused amethyst crystal
$(o)Runic Casings$() act as the receptors of the Echoway, displaying the symbols of a dialed or assigned address. They are made from Architect Stone reinforced with a metallic alloy.
The $(o)Stellar Dial Pedestal$() is the control console and power interface for the entire structure. It channels energy from a Stellar Dial into the Echoway frame during activation.

pages.name: The Echoway
pages.text: The Echoway must be constructed in this exact shape, with the Pedestal placed 8 blocks in front of the ring.

pages.title: Dialing Procedure
pages.text: To activate an established Echoway, you must first place a charged $(l:resonant_battery)Resonant Battery$() into its designated slot in the GUI.$(br2)Then, insert the 5 resonator address of your destination into the dialing slots and press 'Engage'. The Echoway will consume a significant amount of RF from the dial and attempt to establish a connection for 15 seconds.

pages.title: First Activation
pages.text: The first time a newly built Echoway is successfully validated (by right-clicking the pedestal), the system will automatically assign it a permanent, random 5-glyph address. This address will be displayed in the GUI from then on.

Getting lost in another dimension is a serious risk. Thankfully, the Architects seem to have built a failsafe into the system.$(br2)Any new Echoway that is automatically generated when you first travel to another world will come pre-configured. It will contain a fully charged Stellar Dial, and its dialing slots will be pre-filled with the universal address to return to the Overworld.

pages.title: Overworld Address
pages.text: The address to return to the Overworld is a predefined, static sequence. Keep a record of it, as it will always be your way home.
